channel.title: Open-iot-challenge-entries-rsses on Eclipse IoT
channel.description: Recent content in Open-iot-challenge-entries-rsses on Eclipse IoT

item.title: Introducing krishi IoT | An open-source, wireless IoT powered solution for agricultural applications
item.description: In this blog, we will post the updates about the progress we make and the challenges we faced in building the krishi IoT solution. Our team has already taking strides towards making krishi IoT reality. Please keep visit us for updates.

item.title: Retail IoT | Overview of the Solution - The Story
item.description: To start with I will describe the intended solution & the initial architecture that we have in mind. Retail is a fast moving industry and consumers have a negative sentiment about products which are not kept in proper storage condition & which are about to expire or already expired.

item.title: Agrinode | Overview and Architecture of Wireless Sensor Network System (WSN)
item.description: We are going to build a system that consists of two main components which are a gateway and sensor nodes. The sensor nodes collect environmental parameters, then send data to the gateway via WiFi connection.
